author: adwissler
body:
To Whom it May Concern:

How do I show all deployment activities in Powershell?

comments.author: doctordns
comments.body:
What deployment activities?

What is the context of this query?

comments.author: adwissler
comments.body:
Dear Mr. Lee:


When I reinstall and re-register Windows Store apps via PowerShell, it shows the deployment operation progress of some activities, and then it says something.like "20 activities not shown."  How do I get PowerShell to show those activities?


Any help on this would be greatly appreciated.  Thank you very much.


Sincerely,


Andrew Wissler

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @adwissler Please share repro steps and screenshots.

comments.author: adwissler
comments.body:
Dear Ilya:
I can't show you the reproductive steps and screenshots because it's
working fine now, but when I open an elevated PowerShell and run
Get-AppXPackage -AllUsers | Foreach {Add-AppxPackage
